title: Italian Easter egg bread
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons warm water', '100g caster sugar', '1 (7g) sachet dried active baking yeast', '250ml scalded milk', '75g unsalted butter', '2 eggs, beaten', '1 pinch salt', '440g plain flour', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon water', '6 whole eggs in the shell', '65g sugar sprinkles']
